author: Saheli Roy Choudhury
title: Coronavirus live updates: Global cases top 2 million, Singapore records its biggest daily jump
description: Most of Singapore's new cases are linked to infection clusters in dormitories that house foreign workers.
content:
This is CNBC's live blog covering all the latest news on the coronavirus outbreak. All times below are in Beijing time. This blog will be updated throughout the day as the news breaks. 
  • Global cases: More than 2 million
  • Global deaths: At leas… [+5521 chars]
